SEARCH
Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.controllers

Class ProfileController

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.controllers.ProfileController
public class ProfileController extends Object
The ProfileController class is responsible for managing user profiles, interactions, and social activities. It provides methods for displaying user-related views, updating user profiles, and handling social interactions such as likes and follows. The class collaborates with the ViewRenderer, ProfileModel, and SocialModel to achieve these functionalities.

      public boolean isLiked(UUID likedUserId)

      Returns:
      true if the current user has liked the specified user, false otherwise.

    • isLiked

      public boolean isLiked(UUID likedUserId, UUID likedByUserId)
      Checks if a specific user has been liked by another user.
      Parameters:
      likedUserId - The UUID of the user being checked for likes.
      likedByUserId - The UUID of the user who may have liked the specified user.
      Returns:
      true if the specified user has been liked by the given user, false otherwise.
